data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Adjusted Ultrasound, Black Males, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LBICRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LBIC [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: RBICRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RBIC [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: LINCRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LINC [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: RINCRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RINC [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: LOPCRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LOPC [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: ROPCRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, ROPC [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: LBICWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBICRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: RBICWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBICRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: LINCWT45
variable.description: Weight for LINCRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: RINCWT45
variable.description: Weight for RINCRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: LOPCWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOPCRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: ROPCWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROPCRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: MNC45_1
variable.description: Mean of the RT45 variables [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, black males, exam 3]
